00032 //
00033 // Colors are discussed in Chapter 14, page 496
00034 //
00035 Color g_White( 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, fOPAQUE );     
00036 Color g_Black( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, fOPAQUE );
00037 Color g_Cyan( 0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, fOPAQUE );      
00038 Color g_Red( 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, fOPAQUE );
00039 Color g_Green( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, fOPAQUE );
00040 Color g_Blue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, fOPAQUE );
00041 Color g_Yellow( 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, fOPAQUE );    
00042 Color g_Gray40( 0.4f, 0.4f, 0.4f, fOPAQUE );
00043 Color g_Gray25( 0.25f, 0.25f, 0.25f, fOPAQUE );
00044 Color g_Gray65( 0.65f, 0.65f, 0.65f, fOPAQUE );
00045 Color g_Transparent (1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, fTRANSPARENT );
00046 
00047 // Note! If you change these direction vectors around to suit yourself
00048 // Make sure you change it so it retains a left handed
00049 // coordinate system 
00050 Vec3 g_Right(1.0f, 0.0, 0.0f);
00051 Vec3 g_Up(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00052 Vec3 g_Forward(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00053 
00054 
00055 Vec4 g_Up4(g_Up.x, g_Up.y, g_Up.z, 0.0f);
00056 Vec4 g_Right4(g_Right.x, g_Right.y, g_Right.z, 0.0f);
00057 Vec4 g_Forward4(g_Forward.x, g_Forward.y, g_Forward.z, 0.0f);
